page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up at{eight o'clock}and I have a wash.My mum makes my breakfast for me.It is Readybrek.I get my clothes on and my coat and catch the bus to school.I have a game of football before the whistle goes.At{a {quarter past nine}we come in and get out our handwriting books while Mrs. Jones takes the registers.Later, we read our reading books to her and then do maths.After assembly we have playtime when I eat my sweets.School finishes at{half past three.}When I come home from school I get changed and go to Matthew's house.We then go for a bike ride.Then I go home for tea. I play on my swing until my Dad calls me in at{eight o'clock}and I get ready for bed .Then I watch television until it is{ten o'clock.}
